author: tross
msg: QPID-3306 - Provides a more Ruby-like set of APIs on top of the bindings created by swig.
Created the Ruby bindings for Address.

author: tross
msg: QPID-3306 - Provides a more Ruby-like set of APIs on top of the bindings created by swig.
Created the encode and decode methods in
These methods differ from the same methods in Cqpid in that they handle
working with symbols and other non-string values.

author: rickhall
msg: Modify fragment merging aglorithm to properly update dependent map
so that all caps/reqs get replaced by their corresponding synthesized
cap/req from the synthesized host module. If you don't do this, then
hosts with inter-dependencies can get invalid wires. (FELIX-3043)

author: alexdma
msg: - Added bind methods to AbstractOntologyInputSource, and calling them in its subclasses.
- Added loader method and input source for single ontology libraries
